name: Cropped Biker Leather Jacket (Black/Tan)
description:
INFO&CARE
Featuring classic biker styling, a cropped design, asymmetric zip-up fastening, zips to the sleeves and an all-over sun bleached faded effect. Cool and stylish.
The coat is made of smooth man-made sheep leather with polyester fabric lining. Its quality and cool design attract many people’s eyes. This wonderful coat is the best-seller of my hypostatic shop and I decide to introduce it to more of people online.
All sizes are available (XS X M L XL XXL XXXL). 
Colors: Available in Black / Tan.

LOOK AFTER ME
Wipe clean with a damp cloth or sponge, do not tumble dry

name: Mermaid Lace Maxi Skirt (2 colors)
description:
Lace Maxi Skirt
Featuring a fitted, regular waist, and a floor length skirt in a soft lace finish.
Lightweight, romantic, sexy, a little crazy all at once.
Quality linen fabric, perfectly constructed textile and touch. It is difficult to justify the quality by pictures, it is the most tricky part of online shopping. It is our goal from this year, we only use the best fabrics we can find, online shopping is not just impulse purchase by pretty pictures, unique designs deserve quality fabrics even they are humbly priced. 
Lining: Yes
Colors: Available in Black/Cream White

Free Size
Length: 38”/97cm
Natural waist: fits waist around 25”-28”/63-71cm
Hips: fits hips around 35”-38”/89-97cm

name: Chiffon Pleated Maxi Dress (Clash with color)
description:
INFO&CARE
Chiffon pleated maxi dress
Featuring all over pleat detailing and amazing contrast colors
a straight neckline, spaghetti straps 
In a fine pleated fluid finish.
a loose fit
Material: chiffon
Colors: 3 colors to choose --White/Yellow/Blue
Size: one size fits most 
length 43"/109cm (not including the length of shoulder strap), bust free, Hip: Free" (for dress)
model's size:176cm/69"
Fits Us size 0 to US size 16 (bust not exceeding 45 inches be comfortable)

LOOK AFTER Me
40 degree machine wash

PLEASE NOTE
We make every effort to display the colors of each garment as accurately as possible. However, each monitor reproduces colors differently, therefore the color that you see may be slightly different from the actual color. Always refer to the description or just convo us if unsure.
